Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory817.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The blade pierces through the chest of the white knight.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: 'What a wonderful smile, Fida...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziLoopRed.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndRed.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'At this moment, she realizes a vision she had always been reluctant to recall.'}
{3: 'She touches her face, her fingers tracing the curve of her slightly raised lips.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_40.jpg'}
{3: "She realizes she's smiling."}
{3: "But she doesn't understand why."}
{3: 'Smiles should be reserved for moments of joy, yet she feels a void.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_38.jpg'}
{3: "Like a void that she doesn't know how to fill."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory817.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She just stands there, waiting for the smile to fade from her face.'}
{3: 'Until Alpha grabs her cloak, trying to drag her to the final door.'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "There's no need to rush! I'm still catching my breath...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'By the way, why are you here all of a sudden?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'The "Rook" piece can add its points to an ally\'s combat by consuming one of its own dice.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Simply put, it's a highly convenient unit that can appear when needed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'Sounds like a rule you just made up five minutes ago...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Then what do you think would be reasonable?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: "Hmm... You broke through the King's constraints with your strong will to save me, creating a miracle outside the rules—something like that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "Alright... Forget what I said. Pretend you didn't hear it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha continues to drag Fida forward.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: "Uh... wait! Isn't this the time for one of us to say something profound to elevate the situation? We're about to enter the final battle, let's keep some sense of ceremony, okay?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: '...So, what do you want to say?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "I don't know.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "Melaka probably wanted me to understand something. But even now, I don't know what the right thing to do is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "After everything we've been through, I should be a little more mature...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "I should find the answers I'm looking for and focus on ending all of this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'But when it really comes down to it, everything is different from what I expected...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "I don't know what's changed about me, I don't even know if anything has changed at all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'If nothing has really changed...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'A "Pawn" is promoted when it reaches the end of the board.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "But that's not the pawn itself changing. The player simply replaces the pawn, putting another piece in its place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'A pawn is still a pawn; it never truly becomes a "Queen".', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: '...Is that supposed to be comforting?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "In the end, it's just a rule within a game.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'It decides nothing, it defines nothing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "The world can't be as easily understood as a game, and relationships among people can't be as simple as the roles chess pieces represent.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Moving forward may not change anything, but only by running away do we truly change nothing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "If you're really looking for an answer—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "There's no need to rush.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'The journey is still long.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory814.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Every time, I thought it would be the end, but we always managed to overcome the "end."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This time won't be the end either, because...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The journey we're on is still long.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory817.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: "You're telling me this to...?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Of course, to get you to hurry up and open that door.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha gives Fida a push, causing her to stumble nearly falling.'}
{3: 'Though still a bit hesitant, Fida stands in front of the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'At least, I only need to make it here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A "Pawn" is promoted when it reaches the finish line.'}
{3: 'She places her hand on the door.'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'Black... BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'Does this mean you owe me a favor?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "Next time we meet... if there's a next time...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "You'll have to go easy on me, considering what happened this time!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She pushes open the grand door.'}
{3: 'And then—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4001_06.jpg'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: '...I promise you.'}
{3: 'Sword in hand, she steps through the open doorway.'}
{3: 'She cuts through the chains in her path, moving forward.'}
{3: 'Her left eye ignites with a blue flame as she looks up at her longtime nemesis waiting for her.'}
{3: 'The girl sits on the throne, her green eyes filled with laughter, looking down at her.'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'Let the game commence, DEAD MASTER.'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'With this battle—'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'Let\'s put an end to this "conflict"!'}
